title: qqqqqqqqwwsdy
author: qqqqqqqqwwsdy
content: Distributed ai model, does anyone have an idea to create one?

comments.author: IShishkin
comments.body: Quote from: qqqqqqqqwwsdy on March 21, 2023, 01:19:23 AMDistributed ai model, does anyone have an idea to create one?What is a distributed AI model?

comments.author: southerngentuk
comments.body: Do you mean DAI?I am not sure if the infrastructure and data are suitable and adaptable enough for different fields and especially with the current blockchain field between the correlation of products and the ability of blockchain technology to be adopted. optimally utilized.But relax because terms like this are going to be awkward and no one cares if they're actually helpful, the hype is starting to start. The AI ​​trend is probably an inevitable part of this market.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: qqqqqqqqwwsdy on March 21, 2023, 01:19:23 AMDistributed ai model, does anyone have an idea to create one?What do you mean by the distributed AI model? Is it a decentralized one or a centralized one? What are the use case and the benefits of that kind of model? Can you share more references?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: qqqqqqqqwwsdy on March 21, 2023, 01:19:23 AMDistributed ai model, does anyone have an idea to create one?Apparently every token that's ai-themed has some idea so you can go visit their chats and talk with devs. Not that they would be good ideas enough to justify their project existence but they might have some idea. Personally i see little to no point on that. It would be easier just to buy server time from chatgpt4 or ai service. There's really no justification to make things more bulky by taping blockchain in it.
